00006         Mutex::Mutex() {
00007                 if(int error = ::pthread_mutex_init(&m_mutex,NULL))

00013                         MT_EXCEPTION(mt::Exception, "Failed to create a MUTEX object Error no = " << error);
00014         }

00016         Mutex::~Mutex() {
00017                 ::pthread_mutex_destroy(&m_mutex);
00018         }

00020         void Mutex::lock() {
00021                 ::pthread_mutex_lock(&m_mutex);
00022         }

00025                 return ::pthread_mutex_trylock(&m_mutex) == 0;
00026         }
